Property_Description: Presenting Nest Cultures, your gateway to a lifestyle of comfort, connectivity and tranquility. Nest Cultures is an aesthetically designed premium apartments, located in Selaiyur, a rapid developing urban locality nestled between Tambaram and Medavakkam. The apartments are prominently housed in a perfect balance of quiet and dynamic, almost like the Zen way of life. The locality has so much to offer, being one of the most highly preferred destinations to live by families and professionals in the city. The area is perfectly connected with ceaseless transport options to reach every nook and corner of the city.
Builder Description:
THE NEST- The name itself indicates the idealness of shelter, is the most common need of every family. The Nest was incorporated in the year 2008, with a vision to build quality housing for the urban and growing India. We believe the importance of family and also realize that every new home will be a reflection of families personality and values, hence we build every Nest Home with a sense of Commitment, Honor & Pride. We are mainly focused into residential construction like Duplex Homes, Villas, Luxury 1, 2 & 3 BHKs. 


Our Successive performance is based on an efficient organization, dynamic participators, brainy thoughts of Engineers and entrepreneurial management. The projects are in public interest and mainly focused on long term satisfaction of every individual customers. The Nest aims to build stylish, tangible & Dream Homes and make sure that every home seeker gets the absolute value for their money with the unique combination of True Space and Style.
